response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive and tailored to recognize your potential as a discerning buyer. I believe in the transformative power of this product and trust it will serve you well. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for the transaction to take place promptly. Thank you for considering this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
